name: WonderCat Adventures
description: WonderCat is a thrilling one finger runner-platformer with a twist of reflexion. Help the WonderCat come back home through 5 worlds, 50 hand-made levels and 5 giant bosses. Collect the glowing stones to unlock 5 secret levels and extra achievements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any Graphics: Any Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any Graphics: Any Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It's good when you have nothing better to do.
on level 1.6 the game goes to fast and the carts are 2 slow so its really hard sorry but i dont recommend this game
